item.title: Software
item.description: I basically like coding and I am lucky enough to get the opportunity to develop open source software as part of my job. Below are the application that I developed: MAD is a simulator of self-adaptive software architectures. MAD captures the interplay of so-called ‘defencive’ mechanisms (e.g., queues, AQM, auto-scaling, timeouts, back-off, …). MAD runs discrete events simulation and estimates performances including reliability, availability and response time to name a few.
